response.overview: Jason Wright, a young and capable general manager, is secretly married to Cindy Sully, the mysterious chairwoman of their company. When Cindy visits the office to deliver Jason's forgotten watch, his secretary Nina—who harbors a secret crush on him—mistakes Cindy for Jason's mistress. Fueled by jealousy, Nina humiliates and assaults Cindy, even causing her to miscarry their unborn child. Upon discovering the truth, Jason and Cindy orchestrate a plan to expose Nina's schemes.
response.title: Scorned Wife's Revenge
